Title: Frozen II
Genre: Animation, Adventure, Comedy, Family, Fantasy, Musical
Writer: Jennifer Lee (screenplay by), Hans Christian Andersen (story inspired by: "The Snow Queen" by), Jennifer Lee (story by), Chris Buck (story by), Marc Smith (story by), Kristen Anderson-Lopez (story by), Robert Lopez (story by), Allison Schroeder (additional screenplay material by)
Actors: Kristen Bell, Idina Menzel, Josh Gad, Jonathan Groff
Plot: Anna, Elsa, Kristoff, Olaf and Sven leave Arendelle to travel to an ancient, autumn-bound forest of an enchanted land. They set out to find the origin of Elsa's powers in order to save their kingdom.
Awards: Nominated for 1 Oscar. Another 18 wins & 81 nominations.
Production: Walt Disney Animation, Walt Disney Pictures
